import React, {useContext} from 'react' import './ProductDisplay.css' import star_icon from "../Assets/star_icon.png"; import star_dull_icon from "../Assets/star_dull_icon.png"; import {ShopContext} from '../../Context/ShopContext'; const ProductDisplay = (props) => { const {product} =props; const {addToCart}= useContext(ShopContext); //addtocart func to pass the product id return (

{product.name}

(122)

TK {product.old_price}
TK {product.new_price}
For casual wear.

Select Size

S
M
L
XL
XXL

Category:

Tags : Modern, Latest

) } export default ProductDisplay
